name: Atex Brawl
description: Strap on your potato cannon, enter the arena, and get ready for a brawl.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: 2.4 GHz+ Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
